metadata.name: Epivir 10 mg ml oral solution
metadata.composition: Each ml of oral solution contains 10 mg of lamivudine

clinical_particulars.therapeutic_indications: Epivir is indicated as part of antiretroviral combination therapy for the treatment of Human Immunodeficiency Virus HIV infected adults and children

contraindications.disease: Hypersensitivity to the active substance or to any of the excipients listed in section 6 1
contraindications.excipients: Sucrose 20 % w/v (3 g/15 ml);Methyl parahydroxybenzoate;Propyl parahydroxybenzoate;Citric acid Anhydrous;Propylene glycol;Sodium citrate;Artificial strawberry flavour;Artificial banana flavour;Purified water
